pages.title: Swamp Moccasin
pages.text: Agkistrodon piscivorus is a species of pit viper in the subfamily Crotalinae of the family Viperidae.$(br2)It is the world's only semiaquatic viper, and is native to the southeastern United States.$(br2)It is the only venomous species of North America's water snakes and one of 21 venomous snakes in the United States.
